
======Leave Marine & Get Back Marine from AFK======

= Description =

Sets you AFK when you are in lobby or playing game. If want to join again, press PFkey 1-4.

Enter one of these two commands, [[ asw_afk.wiki | asw_afk ]] in client console or [[asw_afk.wiki | /afk ]] in chat mode. See also [[afk.wiki | /afk release]]
